ConeheadZombie - Class in model
The ConeheadZombie class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with a single Piece type that once called can create a ConeheadZombie Piece in of itself.
ConeheadZombie() - Constructor for class model.ConeheadZombie
Creates a ConeheadZombie with 15 health and 4 attack damage.

Coordinate - Class in model
The Coordinate class is used to identify the rows and columns of the game.
Coordinate(int, int) - Constructor for class model.Coordinate
Constructor that takes in the int values of the rows and columns of the coordinates The constructor checks if the values of column and row are within bounds, if the values are not within bounds, exception displayed when the row and column values not within the specific constraints
Coordinate(String) - Constructor for class model.Coordinate
Constructor that takes in the row and column values in a STRING FORMAT of the coordinate.
CoordinateTest - Class in test
The Test Class for the Coordinate
CoordinateTest() - Constructor for class test.CoordinateTest
